column4: REFILE-Microsoft to shut MSN China portal on June 7
column5: SHANGHAI  May 10 Microsoft plans to shut its MSN China portal in June but remains committed to China  the company said in a statement emailed to Reuters on Tuesday.

column4: Marketo working with Morgan Stanley for potential sale - Bbg
column5: May 10 Marketo Inc  a maker of cloud-based marketing software  is working with Morgan Stanley to explore strategic alternatives including a potential sale  Bloomberg reported  citing people with knowledge of the matter.

column4: BRIEF-Tesla expects operating expense up 20-25 percent in 2016 - 10Q
column5: May 10 Tesla Motors Inc estimates operating expenses to grow 20-25 percent in 2016 from 2015 - 10-Q filing Further company coverage:    (Reporting by Alexandria Sage)
